document_data.caption: A spitter.
document_data.name: Spitter
document_data.mainbody: '''Spitters''' were small [[elemental vermin]] native to the [[Elemental Plane of Water]] that could also be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: Spitters possessed a lizard's body with the head, eyes, hands and feet of a frog. Their mouth was filled with sharpened teeth. Their bumpy ridged bodies were usually green in color. They typically measured {{SI|12|"|c}} in length.
document_data.Ecology:
Spitters survived by consuming any liquids they stumbled across.

If threatened, a spitter attempted to bite or spit pellets of water that bludgeoned its attacker.
